title: G910 Logitech Orion Spark Arx Control Compatibility
body: I was just wondering, I recently just picked up this keyboard, and was interested to know if Riot had plans of making an Application for the Arx Control so we are able to see stats and what not on our phones etc, considering on my G510s, when I play League on that, I can see all my stats on the LCD Applet. Just really curious to know if you are willing to put the time into an Arx Control App.

replies.body: haha it's pretty sweet bro, quite as hell compared to most mechanical keyboards, but the lighting system is %%%%ing sweet on it. Overall I am happy with it to be honest, compared to my Logitech G510s and my SteelSeries Apex Keyboards, it is my favourite.

> [{quoted}](name=podgyo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=14OEtber,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-11T03:00:22.018+0000)
>
> haha it's pretty sweet bro, quite as hell compared to most mechanical keyboards, but the lighting system is %%%%ing sweet on it. Overall I am happy with it to be honest, compared to my Logitech G510s and my SteelSeries Apex Keyboards, it is my favourite.

$250 for a keyboard that doesn't make noises, noty.
$250? just got mine at best buy for $179
I just got mine at bestbuy for $139.99
I got mine for free from logitech. They didnt support the G19 and it was under warranty, so they gave the Spark to me for free.
I know this is an old thread, but I am curious about the intergration between League and the G910 and the Arx applet
Yeah I really expected support for this. :(
Please riot! this keyboard is becoming increasingly popular. please make an app for us!
same question here, the keyboard's awesome and i believe quite a bit pros gonna looking into this as well, hopefully we will have the apps to support just like g510.
Man oh man do I want that keyboard T^T
